title: rubber chicken anivia
body:
Anivia would wear a rubber chicken outfit...
basic attacks sound like small squeaky toys...
it would be glorious.

replies.body: I imagine her more as a frozen chicken.

Only if she is reworked to be an AP bruiser like {{champion:31}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:8}}  etc.

So when she tanks hits ( like she would be in rework )

She would make squeeking sounds.

No point of the skin addition if Anivia taking dmg doesn't make a sound, it wouldn't satisfy the player if she wasn't meant to take a good amount of damage

( balanced around {{item:3027}} for example )
I find this quite glorious. Please RITO.
+ 1 for riot to make any new anivia skins! i have them all and i want more
